attributes.action: Publish the scientific evidence to justify the lack of response to Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
The government's seeming lack of action in the face of the global pandemic is leading to unrest and making us feel like the most vulnerable in our society are not protected. 

By publishing the scientific data and models these can be subject to peer review by the scientific community and give us confidence in the approach the government is taking and how that will lead to less deaths and a lower strain on the NHS.
attributes.background: Publish the science that is leading the UK government to take such a radically different approach to Covid-19 management than Italy or Taiwan. Publish the modelling and assumptions so they can be subject to peer review by the international community.
